definitions.definition: To make wrinkles in; to cause to have wrinkles.
definitions.example: Be careful not to wrinkle your dress before we arrive.

definitions.definition: To pucker or become uneven or irregular.
definitions.example: An hour in the tub will cause your fingers to wrinkle.

definitions.definition: (of skin) To develop irreversibly wrinkles; to age.
definitions.example: The skin is the substance that wrinkles, shows age, stretches, scars and cuts.

definitions.definition: (of a surface) Uneven, with many furrows and prominent points, often in reference to the skin or hide of animals.
definitions.example: As the ocean receded from the beach it left the sand appearing wrinkled.
